mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 AS PNROOT, IIF(ECCSTA.ITMREF_0 IS NULL, ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0, IIF(ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0='#', ECCSTA.ITMREF_0, IIF(ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0='-', ECCSTA.ITMREF_0, ECCSTA.ITMREF_0 + '_' + ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0 ) ) ) AS PN FROM ITMMASTER LEFT JOIN ECCSTA ON ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 = ECCSTA.ITMREF_0 WHERE ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 LIKE #{pnOrPnRoot} OR (ECCSTA.ITMREF_0 + '_' + ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0 LIKE #{pnOrPnRoot}) ORDER BY ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 DESC, PN

SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY ECCSTA.ZECCREVMAJ_0 DESC) AS ROWID, ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 AS PNROOT, IIF(ITMMASTER.ECCFLG_0=2, ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 + '_' + ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0, ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0) AS PN, ITMMASTER.TSICOD_0 AS Cat, ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0 AS Version, ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0 AS Desc1, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0 AS Desc2, ITMMASTER.ITMDES3_0 AS Desc3, ITMMASTER.YITM_COMSTA_0 AS Comment, IIF(ECCSTA.EXNFLG_0=2, 5, ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0) AS Status, ITMMASTER.CREDAT_0 AS CreateDate FROM ITMMASTER LEFT JOIN ECCSTA ON ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 = ECCSTA.ITMREF_0 WHERE ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 = #{pnRoot}

SELECT DISTINCT T0.OptionPN FROM ( SELECT ITMREFBPS_0 AS OptionPN FROM ITMBPS WHERE ITMREF_0=#{pnRoot} AND ITMREF_0 !=ITMREFBPS_0 UNION SELECT ITMREF_0 AS OptionPN FROM ITMBPS WHERE ITMREFBPS_0=#{pnRoot} AND ITMREF_0 !=ITMREFBPS_0 UNION SELECT T2.ITMREFBPS_0 AS OptionPN FROM ITMBPS T1 INNER JOIN ITMBPS T2 ON T1.ITMREF_0 = T2.ITMREF_0 WHERE T1.ITMREFBPS_0 = #{pnRoot} AND T2.ITMREFBPS_0 != #{pnRoot} ) T0

SELECT SORDERP.SALFCY_0 AS SalesSite, SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 AS OrderNO, SORDER.ORDDAT_0 AS OrderDate, SORDER.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDER.BPCNAM_0 AS CustomerName, SORDERP.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SORDERQ.QTY_0 AS QTY, SORDERP.NETPRI_0 AS NetPrice, SORDER.CUR_0 AS Currency, SORDER.EECICT_0 AS TradeTerm FROM SORDER LEFT JOIN SORDERP ON SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 = SORDER.SOHNUM_0 INNER JOIN SORDERQ ON SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 = SORDERP.SOHNUM_0 AND SORDERQ.SOPLIN_0 = SORDERP.SOPLIN_0 WHERE SORDERP.NETPRI_0 > 0 AND SORDERP.ITMREF_0 = #{pnRoot} ORDER BY OrderDate ASC

SELECT SQUOTED.SALFCY_0 AS SalesSite, SQUOTED.SQHNUM_0 AS QuoteNO, SQUOTED.QUODAT_0 AS QuoteDate, SQUOTE.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SQUOTE.BPCNAM_0 AS CustomerName, SQUOTED.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SQUOTED.QTY_0 AS QTY, SQUOTED.NETPRI_0 AS NetPrice, SQUOTE.CUR_0 AS Currency, SQUOTED.ORDFLG_0 AS OrderFlag, SQUOTED.SOHNUM_0 AS OrderNO, SQUOTE.EECICT_0 AS TradeTerm FROM SQUOTE LEFT JOIN SQUOTED ON SQUOTED.SQHNUM_0=SQUOTE.SQHNUM_0 WHERE SQUOTED.NETPRI_0 > 0 AND SQUOTED.ITMREF_0 = #{pnRoot} ORDER BY QuoteDate ASC

SELECT DISTINCT PORDERP.PRHFCY_0 AS PurchaseSite, IIF(SORDERQ.YSOQ_PJTORI_0='', SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_PJTORI_0) AS ProjectNO, SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 AS OrderPN, SORDERQ.CREDAT_0 AS OrderDate, PORDERP.POHNUM_0 AS PurchaseNO, PORDERP.POPLIN_0 As Line, PORDER.BPSNUM_0 AS VendorCode, PORDER.BPRNAM_0 AS VendorName, PORDERP.ITMREF_0 AS PurchasePN, PORDERP.ITMDES_0 AS Description, PORDER.CUR_0 AS Currency, PORDERP.NETPRI_0 AS NetPrice, PORDERQ.QTYPUU_0 AS Qty FROM SORDERQ INNER JOIN PORDERP ON ( SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0 = PORDERP.PJT_0 OR SORDERQ.YSOQ_PJTORI_0 = PORDERP.PJT_0 ) AND SORDERQ.SALFCY_0=PORDERP.PRHFCY_0 INNER JOIN PORDERQ ON PORDERQ.POHNUM_0 = PORDERP.POHNUM_0 AND PORDERQ.POPLIN_0 = PORDERP.POPLIN_0 INNER JOIN PORDER ON PORDER.POHNUM_0 = PORDERP.POHNUM_0 WHERE SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 = #{pnRoot} AND PORDERP.NETPRI_0 > 0 ORDER BY OrderDate ASC

SELECT SORDERP.SALFCY_0 AS SalesSite, SORDERP.ITMREF_0 AS PN, SORDER.ORDDAT_0 AS OrderDate, SORDER.SHIDAT_0 AS ShipDate, DateDiff(day, SORDER.ORDDAT_0,SORDER.SHIDAT_0) AS Duration FROM SORDER LEFT JOIN SORDERP ON SORDERP.SOHNUM_0=SORDER.SOHNUM_0 WHERE SORDERP.ITMREF_0=#{pnRoot} AND DateDiff(day, SORDER.ORDDAT_0,SORDER.SHIDAT_0) != 0 ORDER BY SORDER.SHIDAT_0 ASC

SELECT IIF(ITMMASTER.ECCFLG_0=2, ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 + '_' + ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0, ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0) AS PN, ITMMASTER.ITMDES1_0 AS Desc1, ITMMASTER.ITMDES2_0 AS Desc2, ITMMASTER.ITMDES3_0 AS Desc3, IIF(ECCSTA.EXNFLG_0=2, 'Obsolete', (CASE WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =1 THEN 'Active' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =2 THEN 'InDevelopment' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =3 THEN 'OnShortage' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =4 THEN 'NotRenewed' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =5 THEN 'Obsolete' WHEN ITMMASTER.ITMSTA_0 =6 THEN 'NotUsable' ELSE 'UNK' END)) AS PNStatus, ITMMASTER.YITM_SUP_0 AS WC, IIF(SORDERQ.YSOQ_PJTORI_0='', SORDERQ.YSOH_PJT_0, SORDERQ.YSOQ_PJTORI_0) AS ProjectNO, SORDER.BPCORD_0 AS CustomerCode, SORDER.BPCNAM_0 AS CustomerName FROM EXPLOIT.SORDERQ AS SORDERQ LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.SORDER ON SORDERQ.SOHNUM_0 = SORDER.SOHNUM_0 LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.ECCSTA AS ECCSTA ON SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 = ECCSTA.ITMREF_0 AND SORDERQ.ECCVALMAJ_0 = ECCSTA.ECCVALMAJ_0 LEFT JOIN EXPLOIT.ITMMASTER AS ITMMASTER ON ITMMASTER.ITMREF_0 = SORDERQ.ITMREF_0 WHERE SORDERQ.SOQSTA_0 != 3 AND SORDERQ.SALFCY_0 = #{site}
